name: Alone with Cats
description:
Background

You are a cat lover. You decided to adopt stray cats. Take care of them and raise them.

How to play:
  • Change venue between your home and the street
  • Click on cats to adopt them
  • Fullfil cats wishes ! (sleep on carpet, drink milk, want to be pet)
  • Cats grow up and is sent to SPCA
  • Enjoy the moment together while it lasts.
  • BONUS: try not to be a cat killer...
